query:
ALTER TABLE cost_alerts 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS skuId INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS period VARCHAR(7),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS previousPeriod VARCHAR(7),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS previousUnitCost DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS currentUnitCost DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS variationPercent DECIMAL(5,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS thresholdPercent DECIMAL(5,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS alertType VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'novo',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolvedAt DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolvedBy INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolution TEXT;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3uYwUxtivMj8soi.e2c3e95bc24b --database aAFi3UvfwvVXettMY36Wvq --execute ALTER TABLE cost_alerts 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS skuId INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS period VARCHAR(7),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS previousPeriod VARCHAR(7),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS previousUnitCost DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS currentUnitCost DECIMAL(10,4),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS variationPercent DECIMAL(5,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS thresholdPercent DECIMAL(5,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS alertType VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'novo',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolvedAt DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolvedBy INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS resolution TEXT;
